Using a massive wooden statue, Asura generates several [[Amenomihashira]] on its many hands and unleashes them upon his opponent.

== Trivia == 
* In the English version, the technique was mistakenly referred to as its parent technique, the [[Sage Art Wood Release: True Several Thousand Hands]].
